verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: will] attend a Memorial Day reception for Gold Star families at the White House on Monday , marking her first public appearance since her surgery .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: attend] [ARG1: a Memorial Day reception for Gold Star families at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARGM-ADV: marking her first public appearance since her surgery] .
[ARG0: Melania Trump] will attend a Memorial Day reception for Gold Star families at the White House on Monday , [V: marking] [ARG1: her first public appearance since her surgery] .
